name: Smash Wars: Drone Racing
description:
SMASH till your CRASH!

Upgrade and Unlock Drones!

★ Smash obstacles with your Drones!

★ Colorful and vivid HD graphics!

★ 10 FPV Drones, to unlock from!

★ Multiple boosts for word difficulty!

★ Supports Touch and Tilt modes!

★ Challenge and help your friends!

Join the most fun smash surfing, and smash till you crash!

This holiday season for Christmas, get new characters, drones and have fun smashing and beating your friends with you smash score.

Tips:

- The more you smash the more score you get

- Keep any eye on the Smash multiplier

- Surfers can surf, but makes sure you pick the right drone

- Upgrade your drone for higher smash score, and better control

- Always use the free boost to bet more coins

- Don't be shy to watch a video, for some free coins

- Stop going in one subway lane, you can change altitude with your drones

A Universal App with HD optimized graphics. SMASHING is now more fun than Surfing. Lets not just surf in subway, lets smash till you crash.
